metadata.dc:author: Macía Martí, J
Prats Viñas, J
Carol Murillo, J
Sánchez de Toledo Codina, J
Enríquez Civicos, G
Herranz Alvarez, M
metadata.dc:description: We describe a patient diagnosed of neuroblastoma IV-S who presented a hepatic calcification during the treatment. The different possibilities of hepatic calcification in the first year of life are commented.
metadata.dc:title: Calcificación de metástasis hepáticas en el neuroblastoma IV-S.
[Calcification of hepatic metastasis in neuroblastoma IV-S].
